Description: This corpus contains articles from the https://globalvoices.org/ website, where volunteers publish and translate news stories in more than 40 languages.

Language: Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Spanish
Description: This corpus contains articles from newspapers in Dutch, English, French, German, Italian and Spanish from 1986 to 1994.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the ELRA catalogue.

Language: English-Croatian, English- Greek, English-Estonian, English-Latvian, English-Lithuanian, English-Romanian, English-Slovenian, Greek-Romanian, Latvian-Lithuanian, Romanian-German, Romanian-Lithuanian and German-English
Description: This comparable corpus contains sentence pairs extracted from news comparable corpora.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.

Corpus: SETIMES - A parallel corpus of the Balkan languages
Language: Romanian, Turkish, Serbian, English, Bulgarian, Macedonian, Croatian, Greek, Albanian
Description: This parallel corpus contains online news articles extracted from the SETimes webpage.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.

Corpus: The Newspaper and Periodical Corpus of the National Library of Finland, Kielipankki Version
Description: This corpus contains articles from a large variety of Finnish and Swedish newspapers (over 100 for each language) from 1770 to 2011.#SEPThe corpus can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Corpus: The Newspaper and Periodical OCR Corpus of the National Library of Finland (1771-1874)
Description: This corpus contains articles from a large variety of Finnish and Swedish newspapers (over 100 for each language) from 1771 to 1874.#SEPThe corpus can be downloaded from FIN-CLARIN.

This corpus contains articles from a variety of Swedish, English and Finnish newspapers.#SEPThe corpus can be found in the FIN-CLARIN repository although its availability and licence are still under negotiation.
